item.title: Mapping Terror Attacks with Highcharter
item.description: A few days ago someone asked me whether I could visualize the terror attacks of recent years in Europe. Here is an attempt to do exactly this. The code for this blogpost can be found in this GitHub Repository. Getting Started First I need data about terror attacks. For this I downloaded the Global Terrorism Database. Now in Rstudio, I load in the needed packages: pacman::p_load(tidyverse, magrittr, readxl, highcharter) After I put the downloaded .
